channel.title: Ham
channel.description:
Okay i think i got this right but some1 post here im 90% sure but need some1 to confirm it. how peopel log on to your ham server
1. they join your network 2. they use the ip next to your name to log in
and you must have your runserver winodw open
post here[br][size=1]Posted at: November 06, 2006, 09:27:53 PM[/size][hr]bump..
